body_html:
Only #3287 is related (the others don't use tf.cond). There you get a more detailed answer. Short answer: The creation of all the operations which should be executed lazily must be done inside the function call. In your case, you create them and inside the function call just refer to them.

This is not a bug what you see, you are using it wrong. Maybe the documentation in TF could be improved.
